title: TVD Plot & Seasons
description: How well do you remember the storylines?

questions.question: What major event happens to Elena at the end of Season 3?
questions.explanation: Elena drowns with vampire blood in her system and transitions into a vampire at the end of Season 3.

questions.question: Who is the main villain of Season 2?
questions.explanation: Klaus Mikaelson arrives in Mystic Falls seeking to break his hybrid curse using Elena's blood.

questions.question: Damon and Bonnie get trapped in a prison world together.
questions.explanation: In Season 6, Damon and Bonnie are trapped in the 1994 prison world after the Other Side collapses.

questions.question: Who kills Elena's aunt Jenna?
questions.explanation: Klaus kills Jenna as part of his ritual to break the hybrid curse, after turning her into a vampire.

questions.question: What villain is introduced in Season 4 as 'the first immortal'?
questions.explanation: Silas is the first immortal being, even older than the Original vampires, seeking his lost love Amara.

questions.question: Why does Elena leave the show for most of Seasons 7 and 8?

options.text: She's put in a magical sleep linked to Bonnie's life
She takes the cure and ages

questions.explanation: Kai links Elena's life to Bonnie's, putting Elena in a sleep that will only end when Bonnie dies.

questions.question: Stefan dies in the series finale.
questions.explanation: Stefan sacrifices himself to destroy Katherine and Hell, dying as a human after giving Damon the cure.

questions.question: What is the name of the heretic coven introduced in Season 7?
questions.explanation: The Heretics are vampire-witch hybrids who were banished by the Gemini coven and later released.
